recommended_controls: Implement strong encryption, multi-factor authentication, and continuous monitoring.
Ensure access controls, perform regular audits, and implement network segmentation.

system_boundaries: Network boundaries defined within the internal and external network
system_functions: Handles internal employee data, financial transactions
system_criticality: High criticality, necessary for daily operations
data_sensitivity: Contains sensitive employee and financial data
threat_events: Phishing attempt leading to unauthorized access
system_vulnerabilities: Unpatched operating systems, weak authentication mechanisms
current_controls: Two-factor authentication, firewall protection, regular patching
report: Detailed risk assessment report for October 2024

system_boundaries: Updated boundaries with additional cloud storage
system_functions: New HR management module, includes personal employee data
system_criticality: Moderate criticality, but essential for HR department
threat_events: Attempt to access HR data through social engineering
vulnerability_sources: Lack of awareness among HR staff
system_vulnerabilities: HR software vulnerability, lack of employee training
current_controls: HR access policies, employee training programs
report: Detailed risk assessment report for November 2024

system_boundaries: Limited to internal network with minimal external interactions
system_functions: Supports internal reporting and analytics only
system_criticality: Low criticality, does not directly affect core business functions
threat_sources: External hackers with no specific interest in this project
threat_events: Low probability of a successful attack
system_vulnerabilities: No known vulnerabilities affecting the system
report: Risk assessment report indicating minimal risks

system_boundaries: Critical infrastructure system with full access to sensitive data
system_functions: Handles highly sensitive financial and personal data
system_criticality: Very high criticality, essential for the core business
data_sensitivity: Contains highly sensitive financial, personal, and proprietary information
threat_sources: Advanced persistent threats (APTs), targeted insider attacks
threat_events: High likelihood of cyber-attack targeting sensitive financial data
vulnerability_sources: Unpatched vulnerabilities in legacy systems, weak data encryption
system_vulnerabilities: Critical system vulnerabilities due to outdated hardware/software
report: Critical risk assessment report outlining urgent security measures

system_boundaries: Cloud-based ERP system including production servers, databases, and associated network infrastructure. Includes all AWS resources in us-east-1 region, excluding development and testing environments
system_functions: Enterprise Resource Planning system handling financial data, HR records, customer information, and supply chain management. Critical business operations including payroll, procurement, and customer relationship management
system_criticality: High - System is mission-critical for daily business operations. Downtime directly impacts financial transactions, customer service, and organizational productivity. Recovery Time Objective (RTO) is 4 hours
data_sensitivity: High - System processes and stores sensitive data including PII, financial records, and proprietary business information. Compliance requirements include GDPR, SOX, and PCI-DSS
system_vulnerabilities: Multiple critical CVEs in legacy applications
report: Comprehensive risk assessment revealed significant exposure to cyber threats due to the critical nature of the system and its data assets. Key findings include inadequate encryption, monitoring gaps, and patch management challenges. Immediate action recommended on high-priority control implementations to reduce risk to acceptable levels

system_boundaries: Internal Project portal accessible only on company intranet. Includes employee directory, time-off requests, and basic HR document management. Hosted on-premises in primary datacenter
system_functions: Basic HR functions including employee directory management, time-off requests processing, and internal policy document access. No payroll or sensitive employee data processing
system_criticality: Low - System facilitates convenience functions. Short downtime has minimal impact on business operations. Recovery Time Objective (RTO) is 24 hours
data_sensitivity: Low - System handles only publicly shareable employee information (names, departments, office locations) and non-sensitive HR documents. No PII or confidential data stored
report: Risk assessment indicates low overall risk due to system's internal-only accessibility, non-critical function, and absence of sensitive data. Current controls are adequate for the system's purpose. Recommended improvements are primarily for operational efficiency rather than critical security needs
